long_description: The durable Transpack XT1 boot pack is designed to carry soft or hard boots, your helmet and more as you venture into a day of snowy fun. Water-resistant center compartment helps keep your clothing and gear separate from the vented, zippered side boot compartments. Wide-opening main compartment features a cordlock closure on collar, securely cinching in contents. Padded neoprene shoulder straps allow you to carry your gear on your back in comfort, freeing up your hands for your board or skis and poles. Additional zippered side pockets constructed of mesh offer ample storage for tools, keys or other miscellaneous items you need quick access to. Zippered pockets on the lid and inside offer additional organization; all pocket zippers have toggle pulls for ease of use with gloves or mittens. Transpack XT1 boot pack features 600-denier water-resistant coated polyester and a water-resistant tarpaulin bottom.
short_description: The durable Transpack XT1 boot pack is designed to carry soft or hard boots, your helmet and more as you venture into a day of snowy fun.
